name: Yogscast Battle Gifting
description:
The yoglabs cloning machine has gone awry spitting out clones of the yogscast. Two groups of clones meet on a holodeck to duke it out.

This is a multiplayer lan game. so you have to be on the same network as your friends to play with them. One way to play online is to use good ole hamachi. Start a hamachi network and have your friends join to be able to play together.

There is no single player mode. However you can launch the game twice, and connect localy. Just remember to Shift+Tab to go between them

I wont lie gameplay is kinda janky. but hey, so is the yogscast. :D

Join the discord to see the development history, find games, and chat with the devs: https://discord.gg/EaVFrU6

NOTE: The Game is unable to find sessions hosted on another computer. however you can run 2 sessoins on 1 computer and tab between them and still be able to play.
